name: MIDICIDeviceIdentification
desc: A structure that describes a MIDI-CI device.

items.name: var manufacturer: (UInt8, UInt8, UInt8)
items.desc: The MIDI System Exclusive (SysEx) ID of the device manufacturer.

items.name: var family: (UInt8, UInt8)
items.desc: The group of familes to which the device belongs.

items.name: var revisionLevel: (UInt8, UInt8, UInt8, UInt8)
items.desc: The revision number of the device model number.

items.name: var reserved: (UInt8, UInt8, UInt8, UInt8, UInt8)
items.desc: A reserved field whose value is always zero.

items.name: init(manufacturer: (UInt8, UInt8, UInt8), family: (UInt8, UInt8), modelNumber: (UInt8, UInt8), revisionLevel: (UInt8, UInt8, UInt8, UInt8), reserved: (UInt8, UInt8, UInt8, UInt8, UInt8))
